content: this captivating crochet ruana embodies elegance and comfort for a superb layer of warmth crafted from the center out using granny stitch this shawl showcases the mesmerizing beauty of caron cloud cakes perfect phasing yarn watch a gentle gradient transition create the soft and enchanting color blend as you work chain double_crochet granny stitch fringe and more wrap yourself in this versatile piece day or night materials caron® cloud cakes perfect phasing™ 8 oz/227 g 720 yds/658 m aqua 91001 2 balls or 1440 yds/1316 m gauges 16 single_crochet and 20 row = 4 10 cm 16 sts and 7 row = 4 10 cm in pat measurements one size fits all approx 42 106 5 cm wide x 25 63 5 cm long from shoulder excluding fringe
